Columbia offers these boots in multiple colors and sizes.

name: Timberland Men's Flume Mid Waterproof Hiking Boot
product_description: Our waterproof mid-hiker boot grips rocky trails and performs at any elevation. They’re designed to keep you comfy and protected, while also featuring an all-season look that offers tireless waterproof performance and work-boot styling. Other essential features include a compression-molded EVA midsole for extra comfort, a solid rubber outsole with multi-directional lugs, and a seam-sealed construction. By purchasing this product, you are supporting responsible manufacturing of leather through the Leather Working Group. Timberland set new industry standards for craftsmanship, durability and protection when it introduced an authentic, waterproof leather boot in 1973. A global leader in design, engineering and marketing of premium footwear, Timberland values consumers who cherish the outdoors and their time in it. Timberland has been an industry leader in the use of both sustainable and recycled materials in its shoes, as well as its footwear packaging. The Timberland Company believes in corporate responsibility and supports numerous civic and social projects throughout the year.

name: Columbia Womens Newton Ridge Plus Waterproof Amped, Stratus/Canyon Rose, 8
product_description: Finally, a stylish waterproof hiking boot with the comfort and traction you need for tough trails, easy walks—and every adventure in between. The Newton Ridge Plus Waterproof Amped Hiking Boot is made from high quality materials, quality assembly, and strong stitching. It’s a rugged trail-ready boot designed for long lasting hiking wear. Lace up and go.   These hiking boots feature waterproof seam-sealed construction combined with a full grain leather and suede upper, mesh tongue, along with a scratch rubber heel, and outdoor lace hardware. This is the secure and stable boot you want on long treks over uneven and rugged terrain. Columbia offers these women's hiking boots available in several color versions, with true-to-fit sizing.   Imported. Leather upper. Laced closure. Hand Wash.

name: Timberland Men's Mt. Maddsen Hiking Waterproof Boots
product_description: Make footprints on your favorite trail in our Mt. Maddsen waterproof hiking boots. Keeping your feet dry in rugged style, these leather hikers take on any terrain and look great with your performance hiking gear and with jeans and a tee. Uppers made with premium 100 percent waterproof leather from an LWG Silver-rated tannery. TimberDry eco-conscious waterproof membrane. Fully gusseted tongue. Removable anti-fatigue footbed. Compression-molded EVA midsole. 15 percent recycled rubber outsole. Imported. Shaft measures approximately 5 inch from arch. Heel measures approximately 1.5 inch. Platform measures approximately 1 inch. Covered by the Timberland Limited Warranty. Because Timberland is unable to control the quality of products sold by unauthorized sellers, unless otherwise prohibited by law, the limited warranty is not available for products purchased from unauthorized sellers. The warranty claim must be made within 12 months of purchase. Proof of purchase is required. For complete terms, limitations, and instructions on how to make a warranty claim, please visit the Timberland website.
